articles.description: Michael Vaughan says Australia are "slight favourites" to win the fifth Ashes Test, but will there be a Stuart Broad fairytale as the 2023 series concludes?
articles.title: Australia 'favourites' but will there be a Broad fairytale?

articles.description: Max Verstappen was in imperious form as he came from sixth on the grid to win the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen makes it eight in a row with Belgium win

articles.description: Manuela Vanegas scores a 97th-minute winner as Colombia stun Germany 2-1 at the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Injury time winner sees Colombia stun Germany

articles.description: England are frustrated by Australia's strong start to a chase of 384 before rain wipes out half of the fourth day of the final Ashes Test at The Oval.
articles.title: Australia start chase strongly before rain

articles.description: England finish top of their Netball World Cup pool with a perfect record as they beat Scotland 62-37, with both teams already through to the next phase.
articles.title: England beat Scotland to top World Cup pool

articles.description: With key midfielder Keira Walsh ruled out through injury, how might England replace her at the Women's World Cup?
articles.title: How can England replace injured midfielder Walsh?

articles.description: Watch the highlights as Colombia score a late goal to win a thrilling Women's World Cup game against Germany.
articles.title: Colombia pull off one of great shocks against Germany

articles.description: Boxer Tommy Fury will face YouTuber KSI in a bout at Manchester's AO Arena on 14 October.
articles.title: Tommy Fury to face KSI in Manchester in October

articles.description: Chelsea reach an agreement to sign defender Axel Disasi from AS Monaco for 45m Euros (£38.57m).
articles.title: Chelsea agree deal to sign Monaco defender Disasi

articles.description: Innes Senior's four-try haul helps Wakefield thrash Warrington to boost their Super League survival bid.
articles.title: Four-try Senior helps Wakefield thrash Wire
